role.descr: possessor of unique attribute, if separate from arg1

example.name: concatenation of arg1
example.text: What is unique about China is that the ruling party 's legitmacy is intimately assosciated with rapid economic progress .
example.arg: [what], [is that the ruling party 's legitmacy is intimately assosciated with rapid economic progress ]

example.name: both args
example.text: Hair is one of the characteristics of a mammal that-1 [*-1] is unique to mammals

example.name: both args
example.text: The legal system in Louisiana is unique in the U.S. in that it is primarily based on the French and Spanish civil codes.
example.arg: in that it is primarily based on the French and Spanish civil codes

example.name: both args
example.text: the final collapse of that system -- unique on plant earth -- will have a very abrupt and harmful effect on the earth

example.name: both args
example.text: This isn't unique to the Tories.
